message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of optimizing surrogate loss functions for supervised machine learning tasks, with a focus on sequence prediction tasks. This makes it relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), natural language processing (cs.CL), computer vision (cs.CV), speech recognition (cs.SD), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Among these, cs.LG and cs.CL are the most likely categories, as the paper deals with both the optimization of loss functions and the specific problem of sequence prediction.
